      TableColspanManager(org.apache.poi.hwpf.usermodel.Table table)

      • getColspanOffsetBased

        private byte getColspanOffsetBased(org.apache.poi.hwpf.usermodel.TableCell cell)
        Calculates the colspan based on the right edge offset of the current cell. I.e. we assume these offsets are unique

        based on AbstractWordConverter.getNumberColumnsSpanned(int[] tableCellEdges, int currentEdgeIndex, TableCell tableCell)

        Parameters:
        cell - Cell to process
        Returns:
        A colspan value or 1 if no colspan is applicable
